tasks.label: Create Folder Structu
tasks.command: powershell -Command "mkdir -p styles/scss/imports; mkdir -p styles/dist/css; mkdir -p js; mkdir -p assets; New-Item -ItemType File index.html -Force; New-Item -ItemType File js/general.js -Force; New-Item -ItemType File styles/scss/style.scss -Force; New-Item -ItemType File styles/scss/imports/_resets.scss -Force; New-Item -ItemType File styles/scss/imports/_variables.scss -Force; New-Item -ItemType File styles/scss/imports/_mixins-keyframes.scss -Force; New-Item -ItemType File js/styles.js -Force"
